translations: n.摇摆人（指兼能担任得分后卫及小前锋的球员）

phrs.translation: 可兼任多个位置之球员, 能打不同位置的队员, 锋卫摇摆人

sentences.sentence: The 6-7 swingman is capable of guarding every position but center.
sentences.translation: 6 - 7的摇摆人能防守中锋以外的每个位置。

sentences.sentence: The Golden State Warriors have signed free agent swingman Rodney Carney to a contract.
sentences.translation: 金州勇士队刚刚签下了自由人，锋卫摇摆人rodney Carney。

sentences.sentence: Veteran free-agent swingman Michael Finley(notes) has decided to join the Boston Celtics and will sign in the next couple days, his agent said.
sentences.translation: 被马刺买断的锋位摇摆人老将迈克尔·芬利决定加盟波士顿凯尔特人队。 双方将会在接下来的几天内正式签约，以为NBA消息人士告诉雅虎体育。
